name: Evening Tour A Taste of Yangon
description: Although it is underrated in comparison with neighbouring cuisines like Thai and Vietnamese, Burmese food offers many mouth-watering surprises for the uninitiated. On this evening culinary focussed expedition around the streets and alleys of Yangon - the biggest city in Myanmar - guests will have the chance to sample a full spectrum of delicious specialities from the so-called "Golden Land".
